title: 3.4k upvotes... no red response...
body:
[Really Rioters?](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/YEa8tMs0-3-refunds-per-season-upvote-if-you-want-3-refunds-per-season)

How does a thread have over 21k views, and 3.4k+ upvotes, and you have not a single... NOT ONE rioter even POST on this thread...

Yet threads that are absolutely stupid, that no one cares about you have with 4-9 red responses...

We're tired of the whole "i was just skimming the boards" bullcrap excuse... How about you actually address the topics your players care the most about for once?

replies.body:
Because Riot gains absolutely nothing from commenting.

They aren't going to give free shit to people because a couple people bitched about it. And the only answer that satisfies the thread is "Yep we'll do exactly what you want"

Same reason "Unlock all champs in ARAM for free!" doesn't get a response. Because Riot isn't going to do it.
Except the 'unlock all champs for ARAM' thing did get a Riot response. And that response is 'we're thinking about it.'
Just like Solo Q :^)
laughed so hard at this my stomach and sides started hurting... thank you

Just to jump in, that really doesn't mean much. As my father (a vice-ceo) once wisely told me, theres only two things you need to say to stall for time and satisfy people. 'I need more information on the matter.' and 'I will take it into consideration.'.
To be fair, a non-response doesn't exactly count.

> [{quoted}](name=killd0zer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O6EsXdM1,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-04-04T01:54:23.658+0000)
>
> Because Riot gains absolutely nothing from commenting.
> 
> They aren't going to give free shit to people because a couple people bitched about it. And the only answer that satisfies the thread is "Yep we'll do exactly what you want"
> 
> Same reason "Unlock all champs in ARAM for free!" doesn't get a response. Because Riot isn't going to do it.

Well... actually Riot has commented on liking the idea of unlocking all champs for ARAM.

Why the fuck would they comment on something that they already stated professionally on their website? They literally have a whole graphic presentation on why they don't give extra refunds/how refunds work here. At least do some resserch befor you go rabbling on the boards about old shit.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864

These boards aren't a democracy. Riot is not required to respond to threads that get X amount of upvotes. 

ESPECIALLY when those threads are, quite literally, 'upvote if you want free things.' Of course those are gonna get highly upvoted, and of course riot's gonna ignore you.

Riot is also not required to update their game, keep it balanced or organize weekly tournaments and so forth... Quite frankly, they are not required to do anything. But if they want people to keep playing this frustrating mess of once great game, they should probably keep on doing all of the above and also give answers to such hot topics as: "Where the fuck is the solo queue?", "How is devourer still a thing?", "Why do they squeeze the last life out of some champions(karthus wall of pain slow nerf) while compensating other champion's nerfs with buffs(recent fiora and yi "nerfs")", "Death timers", "Turrets" and other countless topics that consistently take over weekly tops of the boards.

While I agree that this thread is not a particularly good example of good discussion topic, there are tons that are. And yet we see red answers to topics which contents are just objectively false and the topic itself gets downvoted into negative numbers.

I'm not saying that Riot shouldn't talk more. Riot definitely should talk more. But they also need to know what they're talking about; Riot talking when they shouldn't has caused problems in the past. Hell, 'Riot talking when they shouldn't' is one of the reasons the solo queue thing is so annoying to many people; if Lyte had just said 'maybe later' or something, there'd be backlash, but there wouldn't be daily threads about it.

Isn't it weird? How they won't comment on something they've commented about before? And that they won't do it because they're going to say no which will just incite more rage?

They've said NO on this topic multiple times. There are NO refunds coming. You get THREE. FOREVER. That's it. Make your purchases wisely. They told us when they GAVE us refunds that this was the case. This isn't news. This isn't something we can haggle.
3 refunds per season is a ridiculous fever dream. Thats why they dont post on it. There is 0 way it will ever happen and it shouldnt.

Ofc there will be thousands of upvotes for something that greedy.  How about do your research before you waste your money?  I don't understand why anyone should need that many refunds.. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

This is not a democracy, and Rito is not the government. They don't have online petitions, in fact they have employee policies restricting them from red posting in situations like this.
Sorry that I'm being callous, but that's the bottom line.
MMMMMM... Boards butthurt.  Delicious.

Lol from what you wrote I clicked the link thinking it would be some thread about Cassiopeia or something else important... :p

As if 3 refund per season was something important. Of course such title and thread (thread multiplicated 3-4 times?) would have so many upvotes, I upvoted it myself, but it might be a bad idea :|

they dont respond to threads about refunds because they have routinely responded to those threads in the past and the response is always the same. its not changing. at this point its just beating a dead horse.

if a kid bugs you for your opinion on something over and over and you tell him "this is what I think" and then you ask him again and again and again eventually he is going to just stop answering you.

Different people man. You got all the Reds except the balance Reds showing up and commenting on these small threads. Why? Cuz they like to have fun on the Boards.

Trust me, KateyKhaos isn't gonna be addressing any balance issues any time soon.

Like someone said, this is covered on the support page. What do you want them to do, have a red drop by, and post "sorry, but we have a standing policy on this issue _link to support faq_"? Then you'll just complain that they made the response they did.

Edit: Also the first two comments sorted by best have almost as many upvotes as  this thread (17+11=28 vs 40) and you haven't responded to either of them. Yeah they aren't that close individually, but it's still a decent expression that a dissenting opinion is popular and you want riot to do something you aren't willing to do here it looks like.

Rioters don't respond to most things simply because everything they say is going to be heavily criticized. Take a look at meddler and the "there is a world in which solo queue doesn't exist" just a chance it won't but the boards blew up.
Because Riot doesn't like losing money.

> [{quoted}](name=L Psy Congroo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O6EsXdM1,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-04-03T21:55:13.020+0000)
>
> Because Riot doesn't like losing money.

Because responding to a thread is going to instantly do anything outside of them responding to the thread.

If they went into any of those threads and didn't say "We're thinking about it" or "Yes we'll do it!", you know as much as I do they'd be downvoted into the Earth and 100% nothing productive would come of it.

Honestly I don't really care about refunds anymore, the new hextech system allows you to try out skins if you want to buy them. Besides even if we did get new refunds each season if you have ever looked at the refund you can only refund stuff you bought like in the last couple months, if I wanted to refund something it would be something I bought at like level 5 with the free rp I got.
Ohh the joys of a being a 1trickpony. Absolutely zero reason in trying to collect every champion.

Because there's no need for them to comment on it?

They've already responded to this before, just because a lot of people would like it doesn't mean its feasible or necessary.

We're lucky they gave us 3 refunds in the first place. Usually you have to contact support to even get considered for a refund, but we have them in the client. Be more careful about what you buy, it isn't that difficult. Be a smart consumer and you won't need additional refunds.

Still don't know what you people do with your refunds. Like seriously I used two of mine on things that went on sale after I purchased them netting myself a free champ but I've never needed one, never thought about using my last one for anything.
Cause they tend to listen to only a small portion of the playerbase.

The thread has been posted before. Just search back to 2008 when people were probably bitching about refunds *before the game even existed*. Any Riot response to this repetitive whining would be back in 2010 at least
And there is an entirely seperate thread linking to that thread that has almost just as much popularity.

Riot honestly just has a random slot of 3-4 of them group up on the same day to respond to the same exact thread 90% of the time just to fill up the red tracker. Its not out of enjoyment, its just like a "Alright Kiddos, its boards day!" in which they pout and shout "I dont wanna!", and cross their arms, throwing a fit as they walk to their computers to do it anyways.
[insert upvote gif here]

You do realize it's the weekend right?
And a good chunk of Rioters, like you and me, likely don't work during the weekend?
